channel.title: Reasoning Behind Private Servers
channel.description:
I really wanted to start this discussion, as many people do not agree and have seperate opinions on this.
Would you consider a replicate of Runescape or a different server, such as Dodian, that has its own "storyline" and "gameplay."
Some many great, and experienced, members of this community try to create servers, "excactly like runescape." Is that really what people what? Or do they come to private servers because, "We are different."
I mean, if you want to play Runescape, they shouldn't you just go play Runescape? But if you want something different, aren't you in the right place?
[b]Discuss...[/b]

item.title: Reasoning Behind Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Newty:

Most people play private server’s because they are to lazy to grind levels out in Runescape :o

This.
